scripts.build: echo 'Python ML backend: Prompt handler - no build step needed'
scripts.test:watch: echo 'Pytest watch mode is not configured' >&2 && exit 1
scripts.format: uv run ruff check --select I,RUF022 --fix && uv run ruff format
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
